faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a_0: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.
faq.q_1: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.a_1: We offer a 14-day free trial for the Pro plan. No credit card required to start.
faq.q_2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a_2: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and PayPal. For Enterprise plans, we support wire transfers.
